comments:
I20060315-1200

Compare with Local History fails for CVS files without network connection:

- disable network connection
- on a CVS file with local changes, open context menu and try to compare with local history
=> Compare With > History... does not work - it throws this error:

org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.connection.CVSCommunicationException[-6]: java.net.NoRouteToHostException: No route to host dev.eclipse.org could be found
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ssh2.CVSSSH2ServerConnection.internalOpen(CVSSSH2ServerConnection.java:184)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ssh2.CVSSSH2ServerConnection.open(CVSSSH2ServerConnection.java:107)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.connection.Connection.open(Connection.java:128)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.connection.CVSRepositoryLocation.createConnection(CVSRepositoryLocation.java:532)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.connection.CVSRepositoryLocation.openConnection(CVSRepositoryLocation.java:773)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Session.open(Session.java:152)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.RemoteFile.getLogEntries(RemoteFile.java:264)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.actions.CompareWithRevisionAction$2.run(CompareWithRevisionAction.java:81)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.repo.RepositoryManager.run(RepositoryManager.java:677)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.actions.CVSAction$2.run(CVSAction.java:349)
at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)
Changed it so you can get local history (if available) when network is disconnected.

traces.message: No route to host dev.eclipse.org could be found
